testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Absolutely amazing experience! The stylist understood exactly what I wanted and delivered beyond my expectations. The salon atmosphere is so relaxing and professional.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: Best salon experience I've ever had! The team is incredibly talented and the results speak for themselves. I always leave feeling confident and stylish.

testimonials.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonials.text: From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed and valued. The attention to detail and level of service is unmatched. Highly recommend to everyone!
